name: NEON HEARTBEAT
description:
Parkour, double jump, and sprint to the hospital before your HEART EXPLODES! 

Neon Heartbeat was created for the Make-A-Level Jam. The theme was "EMERGENCY" and was required to be a platformer with a single level.

https://itch.io/jam/make-a-level-may

Neon Heartbeat was created with the following tools and assets:

Unity 

Adobe Photoshop

NeoFPS: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/tools/game-toolkits/neofps-fps-controller-...

Dark City: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/environments/sci-fi/dark-city2-cyberpun...

Rain Maker: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/vfx/particles/environment/rain-maker-2d-an...

cyberpunk - High City: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/environments/sci-fi/cyberpunk-high-city...

MUSIC: DOS-88 - City Stomper: https://soundcloud.com/dos-88/dos-88-city-stomper
